text: A Boy and a Girl () is a 1966 Soviet drama movie directed by Yuliy Fayt.Режиссер морального беспокойстваМальчик и девочка It stars Natalya Bogunova, Nikolay Burlyaev, and Antonina Bendova. == Actors == * Natalya Bogunova as girl * Nikolay Burlyaev as boy * Antonina Bendova as Tanya * Tamara Konovalova as Nadya * Pavel Kormunin as game director == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1966 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Yuliy Fayt Category:Movies set in Ukraine Category:Soviet drama movies
title: A Boy and a Girl (1966 movie)
